turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about National University Ostroh Academy.
turn.1: What is National University Ostroh Academy?
turn.2: National University Ostroh Academy  National University "Ostroh Academy" (, translit.: "Natsional'nyi Universytet Ostroz'ka Akademiia") is a Ukrainian self-governed (autonomous) research university that was opened in 1994 by the Presidential Decree of April 12, 1994. The university considers itself a continuation of the historical Ostroh Academy.
turn.3: How is NaUKMA connected to the Academy?
turn.4: NaUKMA was a key lobbyist for and partner in the revival of National University Ostroh Academy.
turn.6: Today the Ostroh Academy maintains strong links to NaUKMA.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: Both were the only higher education institutions in Eastern Europe at the respective times.
turn.10: Ostroh town is called "The Volyn Athens" and mainly it is because of the Academy.
turn.11: Is there anything else notable about the Academy?
turn.12: The poet Penkalsky wrote in 1600: “The muse lodged in jail, even the god of art Apollo has left the island of Delos and moved to Ukraine”.
